meanings.definition: A member of a motorcycle gang.
meanings.sent1: The bikies rode their motorcycles together.
meanings.sent2: The bikies gathered at the clubhouse for a meeting.
meanings.sent3: The bikies decided to have a barbecue at the clubhouse.
meanings.sent4: The bikies were a pack of rebels on two wheels.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bikies in their leather jackets was intimidating.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of bikies riding down the street.
meanings.sent2: The bikies parked their motorcycles in a row.
meanings.sent3: The bikies shared a giant pizza after their ride.
meanings.sent4: The bikies were like a flock of birds on their bikes.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bikies' engines echoed through the neighborhood.
